question: Which institute has launched the new website for JEE Advanced 2020?
explanation: IIT Delhi launched the website for JEE Advanced 2020, the national level exam which is being conducted for admission to 23 IITs. The website will contain the pertinent information for the candidates aspiring to appear in the JEE Advanced 2020, which is scheduled to be held on May 17, 2020. The website has been launched by Chairman, IIT Joint Admission Board 2020, Prof. V Ramgopal Rao.
